title: Béchamel
steps: Melt butter in saucepan over medium heat.
Whisk in flour. Cook 1 minute without browning.
Simmer, whisking frequently, until thick enough to coat a spoon, 5-7 minutes.
Season with nutmeg, salt, and white pepper.
Use immediately or press plastic wrap directly on surface to prevent skin.
notes: Don't brown the flour - should stay white.
Base for cheese sauce, gratins, lasagna.
